dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S1963 PCS: To repeal section 403 of the Bipartisan Budget Act of 2013.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Pryor (for himself, Mrs. Hagan, Mrs. Shaheen, and Mr. Begich) introduced the following bill; which was read the first time
Read the second time and placed on the calendar

form.official-title: To repeal section 403 of the Bipartisan Budget Act of 2013.

section.header: Repeal of certain reductions made by the Bipartisan Budget Act of 2013
section.text: Section 403 of the Bipartisan Budget Act of 2013 (Public Law 113â€“67) is repealed as of the date of the enactment of such Act.

endorsement.action-desc: Read the second time and placed on the calendar
